name: Safuchain
description: SafuChain supercharges $ETH to bring crypto applications like NFTs, games, and DeFi to the $ETH community in a completely new way. What is SafuChain? SafuChain supercharges $ETH to bring crypto applications like NFTs, games, and DeFi to the $ETH community in a completely new way. Unfortunately, $ETH cannot support any of these safety precautions natively (or any other dApps). SafuChain fixes this. With SafuChain, Dogecoin, Shiba holders, and many other communities alike can do more than simply HODL and wait for $ETH to moon, and feel safe whilst doing so! Decentralized Finance, ‍done right. The blockchain has given us some unique powers over the years, anonymity, blazing fast transfers, freedom of oppression in many ways. Yet, this freedom has come with a cost. Many have used this very freedom as a form of exploitation on the masses, The team at SafuChain, has used this same freedom, and right, to forge a chain clean of liquid robbers, and racoon devs. Chads, and whales no longer have to stand for it, SafuChain offers a better way. It’s time to unleash the creativity and full potential of the Crypto community.
